Partners

This page contains a list of all of our society's sponsors, and other companies that have asked to be featured on our page. We will update this list as we agree to work with more partners!

These companies are all excellent places to apply for a cybersecurity career, so keep an eye out for opportunities posted by them and feel free to get in touch via the listed contact details
